hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:“Fatimah bint Qais said: 'O Messenger of Allah, (ﷺ) I am afraid that someone may enter upon me by force.' So he told her to move

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ تَخْرُجُ الْمَرْأَةُ فِي عِدَّتِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Can a woman go out during her waiting period?
